mapper.sql: s.id,s.money, s.settlementOrderNumber, s.remarks, s.settlementState, s.platformState, s.type, s.userID,s.refID, s.thirdPlatform, s.thirdOrderNumber, s.launchTime, s.payTime, s.callbackTime, s.createTime, s.updateTime, s.version, s.isDeleted, s.createBy, s.updateBy

where 1=1 and s.id = #{condition.id} and s.settlementOrderNumber = #{condition.settlementOrderNumber} and s.remarks = #{condition.remarks} and s.settlementState = #{condition.settlementState} and s.platformState = #{condition.platformState} and s.type = #{condition.type} and s.userID = #{condition.userID} and s.refID = #{condition.refID} and s.thirdPlatform = #{condition.thirdPlatform} and s.thirdOrderNumber = #{condition.thirdOrderNumber} and s.launchTime = #{condition.launchTime} and s.payTime = #{condition.payTime} and s.callbackTime = #{condition.callbackTime} and s.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and s.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and s.version = #{condition.version} and s.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and s.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and s.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy}

where 1=1 and s.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(s.settlementOrderNumber) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.settlementOrderNumber}),'%')) and UPPER(s.remarks) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.remarks}),'%')) and UPPER(s.settlementState) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.settlementState}),'%')) and UPPER(s.platformState) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.platformState}),'%')) and UPPER(s.type) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.type}),'%')) and UPPER(s.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(s.refID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.refID}),'%')) and UPPER(s.thirdPlatform) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.thirdPlatform}),'%')) and UPPER(s.thirdOrderNumber) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.thirdOrderNumber}),'%')) and UPPER(s.launchTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.launchTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.payTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.payTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.callbackTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.callbackTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(s.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(s.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(s.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(s.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%'))
mapper.update: update settlement set settlementOrderNumber=#{settlementOrderNumber}, remarks=#{remarks}, settlementState=#{settlementState}, platformState=#{platformState}, type=#{type}, userID=#{userID}, refID=#{refID}, thirdPlatform=#{thirdPlatform}, thirdOrderNumber=#{thirdOrderNumber}, launchTime=#{launchTime}, payTime=#{payTime}, callbackTime=#{callbackTime}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from settlement s where s.id = #{id} and s.isDeleted = false
